Unable_to_load_the_transaction: Unable to load the transaction, double check that the hash is correct and try again!
any_device_text: Send and receive Nano from any device using the web wallet, or download the desktop wallet available for Windows/Mac/Linux.
choose_option_configure_wallet: To get started, choose an option below to configure your wallet
dont_have_nano: Don't have any Nano, but want to see how quick and easy it is to use?
helpful_features_text: Store labels for your friends and your own accounts in the address book, track your balances in your local currency, and more!
my_nano_ninja_text: Representative lists, scores and many more is directly integrated! For more information visit MyNano.Ninja.
no_strings_attached_text: Because no information is ever stored on a server, there is no account to login to or email address required. Create as many wallets as you want and switch between them easily.
open_source_available_at: NanoVault is open source and all code is available at https://github.com/BitDesert/nanovault.
please_submit_bugs_github: Please submit any feedback or bug reports on our GitHub page.
security_text: All sensitive operations happen in your browser only - your seed and private keys are never sent across your network, or stored on any server in any format. (So there is no need for server-based authentication measures such as 2FA)
the_no_strings_attached_wallet: The "no strings attached" open source wallet for Nano
use_the_faucet: Use the Nano Faucet with your NanoVault account to get going instantly!
wallet_already_configured: It looks like your wallet is already configured.
You_have_delegated_weight: You have delegated voting weight to the following representatives
no_rep_not_opened: None of your accounts have delegated any voting weight yet, you must receive a transaction to change your representative!
click_on_rep_to_select_accounts: Click on a representative to select all of the accounts delegated to it
when_send_nano_you_have_to_receive: When someone sends you Nano, you are also in charge of performing a receive block to actually receive the funds.
if_opened_receive_automatic: If you have the wallet open when you receive a transaction, this will be performed automatically.
select_account_to_receive: Otherwise, select the account you are expecting to receive from below to search for pending transactions.
backup_unlock_wallet: To access backup options, unlock your wallet.
to_backup_seed_clipboard: To backup your wallet seed and copy it to your clipboard:
to_backup_mnemonic_clipboard: To backup your wallet mnemonic phrase and copy it to your clipboard:
use_this_simplify_transfer: Use this export tool to simplify wallet transfer to other devices.
data_encrypted_and_imported: Your data will be encrypted by your password, and then imported into NanoVault on your new device!
export_no_address_book: The export does not contain your address book.
scan_qr_to_load_wallet: Scan the QR code on any device to load your NanoVault wallet!
if_no_qr_scanner_import_url: If you do not have a QR code scanner, you can also import your wallet by using the URL below.
use_this_transfer_address_book: Use this tool to simplify transferring your address book between devices.
use_options_import_export_address_book: Use the options below to import or export your address book from a file or QR Code/URL.
address_book_not_encrypted: Your address book is not encrypted by your wallet password.
scan_qr_to_load_address_book: Scan the QR code on any device to import your NanoVault Address Book!
if_no_qr_scanner_import_address_book_url: If you do not have a QR code scanner, you can also import your address book by using the URL below.
issue_reading_import_data: There was an issue reading the import data.
double_check_address: Double check the address and try again.
almost_finished_wallet_password: Almost finished - just enter your wallet password to decrypt your wallet!
wallet_import_success: Your wallet has been successfully imported!
address_book_import_success: Your address book has been successfully imported!
use_options_to_import_wallet: Use the options below to import an existing wallet or create a new one.
You_already_have_a_wallet_configured: You already have a wallet configured
before_backup_seed: Before going any further, be 100% certain you have backed up the seed to your current wallet!
without_it_unrecoverable: Without it, any funds you have will become completely unrecoverable!
explanation_seed: When you create a new wallet, a new Nano seed will be generated which can be used to create brand new accounts on the Nano network. Your Nano seed is the master key to all of your accounts and any money inside of them!
make_sure_backup_seed: Make sure you back up your seed, write it down, and keep it incredibly safe! There is NO way to recover it after creation, and all funds inside WILL be lost without it! You have been warned!
saved_wallet_before_import: If you have saved your wallet to a file using NanoVault before, use the button below to import it.
enter_seed_to_import: Enter your 64 character seed from any Nano wallet to import it below.
enter_mnemonic_to_import: Enter your wallet mnemonic phrase generated from any Nano wallet to import it below.
make_sure_app_installed_connect_ledger: Make sure you have the Nano app installed, then connect your ledger device via USB (Chrome/Opera only).
connect_via_usb_nano_app: Connect your ledger device via USB and make sure you have the Nano app installed, then press the button below to retry.
unlock_ledger_retry: Unlock your Ledger device, then press the button below to retry.
import_ledger_wallet: Press the import button below to use your ledger wallet.
wallet_has_been_created: Your new Nano wallet has been created!
below_mnemonic_seed: Below is the mnemonic phrase and seed for your wallet, you can use whichever you prefer.
last_step_password_wallet: The last step is to set a new password for your wallet. Your password is used to encrypt the sensitive parts of your wallet when it is locked, which disables sending, receiving, creating accounts, and other operations.
wallet_has_been_configured: Your wallet has been configured and you are ready to send and receive Nano!
if_lose_password_restore_seed: If you lose your password, you can always restore your wallet using your seed.
press_ledger_status_bar_reload: Press the Ledger status bar on the left side to reload your Ledger when connecting or disconnecting it.
use_address_book_store_label: You can use the address book to store a label for your own accounts and others you frequently transact with, which are visible throughout the application.
Name: Name
You_dont_have_any_accounts_yet: You don't have any accounts yet.
Click_on_an_account_to_view_more_details: Click on an account to view more details!
